hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Fire Temple#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ToT (Right-Center).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.
